title: 修改权限文件后，任何权限都没有了
author: 没名字取了

replies.author: 没名字取了
replies.txt_content:
以及被我改过的权限文件

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - automessage.receive.default
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&7[初生者]&f'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - iconomy.top
    - fireworks.login
    - scavenger.scavenge
    - essentials.kits.firework
    - chestcommands.item.main-menu.yml
    - chestcommands.open.main-menu.yml
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.limit.1
    - essentials.hat
    - travelportals.portal.create
    - travelportals.portal.destroy
    - travelportals.portal.use
    - travelportals.command.help
    - travelportals.command.hide
    - travelportals.command.list
    - travelportals.command.name
    - travelportals.command.warp
    - travelportals.command.info
    - travelportals.command.claim
    - Signshop.Signs.*
    - Signshop.CopyPaste
    - assassination.* 
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2[冒险家]&a'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Brave:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      prefix: '&1[勇者]&9'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Leader:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      prefix: '&3[领袖]&b'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Duke:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - leader
    info:
      prefix: '&5[城主]&d'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  King:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - duke
    info:
      prefix: '&6[君王]&e'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    - travelportals.admin.command.name
    - travelportals.admin.command.warp
    - travelportals.admin.command.claim
    - travelportals.admin.command.hide
    - travelportals.admin.portal.use
    - travelportals.admin.portal.destroy
    - travelportals.admin.command.deactivate
    - travelportals.admin.command.export
    - travelportals.admin.command.renameworld
    - travelportals.admin.command.fixworld
    info:
      prefix: '&c[神使]&d'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    - spectate.*
    info:
      prefix: '&4[神官]&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    - shop.*
    -spectate.cantspectate
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&e[神谕者]&6'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: 没名字取了
replies.txt_content: 解决  ╮(╯▽╰)╭   无语  多加了点东西

replies.author: jw658
replies.txt_content: 嗯看起来就是格式什么地方排错了的问题，error log里面说不能parse。不过你好想已经解决了嘛
